titleStmt.title: An exposition after the maner of a co[n]templacyon vpon ye .li. psalme, called Miserere mei Deus
Expositio in psalmos Miserere me Deus. English
titleStmt.author: Savonarola, Girolamo, 1452-1498.
Marshall, William, fl. 1535.

publicationStmt.publisher: In flete strete by John Byddell dwellynge next to Flete brydge at the sygne of our lady of pytye, for wyllyam Marshall,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by William Marshall (?), of: Savonarola, Girolamo. Expositio in psalmos Miserere me Deus.
Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Identified as STC 21795 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: to Flete brydge at the sygne of our lady of pytye
